text.1204: lubbhantā vajjaṃ samādiyanti, vajjaṃ samādiittā cāuranta-saṃsāra
text.1206: koheṇaṃ māṇeṇāṃ māyāe lobheṇam. tesiṃ ca -aṃ ahaṃ parighāta
text.1213: piṇḍaṃ sejjaṃ uvahiṃ ca ese bhāvemi tti addālaeṇaṃ
text.1216: kovaṃ kiccā mahā-bāṇaṃ | appā vindhai appakaṃ
text.1217: maṇṇe bāṇeṇa viddhe tu | bhavam ekkaṃ viṇijjati /
text.1220: māṇaṃ kiccā mahā-bāṇaṃ | appā vindhai appakaṃ
text.1221: maṇṇe bāṇeṇa viddhe tu | bhavam ekkaṃ viṇijjati /
text.1224: māyaṃ kiccā mahā-bāṇaṃ | appā vindhai appakaṃ
text.1225: maṇṇe bāṇeṇa viddhe tu | bhavam ekkaṃ viṇijjati /
text.1228: lobhaṃ kiccā mahā-bāṇaṃ | appā vindhai appakaṃ
text.1229: maṇṇe bāṇeṇa viddhe tu | bhavam ekkaṃ viṇijjati /
text.1231: tamhā tesiṃ viṇāsāya | sammam āgamma saṃmatiṃ /
text.1233: jesu jāyante kodh' ātī | kamma-bandhā mahā-bhayā /
text.1235: satthaṃ sallaṃ visaṃ jantaṃ | majjam vālaṃ dubhāsaṇaṃ /
text.1237: ātaṃ paraṃ ca jāṇejjā | savva-bhāveṇa savvadhā /
text.1238: āy' aṭhaṃ ca par' aṭhaṃ ca | piyaṃ jāṇe taheva ya
text.1239: sae gehe palittammi | kiṃ dhāvasi parātakaṃ? /
text.1241: āt' aṭhe jāgaro hohi, | mā par' aṭhāhidhārae /
text.1242: āt' aṭho hāvae tassa | jo par' aṭhāhidhārae
text.1244: tujjha moṇaṃ karentassa | ke aṭhe parihāyati?
text.1246: attā samāhi-karaṇaṃ | appaṇo ya parassa ya
text.1249: jaggāhi, mā suvāhī, | mā te dhamma-caraṇe pamattassa /
text.1251: panc' indiyāi saṇṇā | daṇḍā sallāi gāravā tiṇṇi /
text.1252: bāvīsaṃ ca parīsaha | corā cattāri ya kasāyā
text.1253: jāgaraha -arā niccaṃ, | mā bhe dhamma-caraṇe pamattāṇaṃ /
text.1258: je suvati -a se suhite, | jāgaramāṇe suhī hoti
text.1259: jāgarantaṃ muṇiṃ vīraṃ | dosā vajjenti dūrao /
text.1261: evaṃ se siddhe buddhe ... -o puṇar-avi icc-atthaṃ havvam āgacchati tti bemi.
text.1264: uppatatā uppatatā uppayantaṃ piteṇa vocchāmi. kiṃ santaṃ
text.1267: pattassa mama ya annesiṃ mukko kovo duh' āvaho
text.1268: tamhā khalu uppatantaṃ sahasā kovaṃ nigiṇhitavvaṃ.
text.1269: kovo aggī tamo maccū | visaṃ vādhī arī rayo /
text.1270: jarā hāṇī bhayaṃ sogo | mohaṃ sallaṃ parājayo
text.1271: vaṇhiṇo -o balaṃ chittaṃ, | koh' aggissa paraṃ balaṃ /
text.1272: appā gatī tu vaṇhissa, | kov' aggiss' amitā gatī
text.1275: ekaṃ bhavaṃ dahe vaṇhī, | daḍḍhass' avi suhaṃ bhave /
text.1276: imaṃ paraṃ ca kov' aggī | -issankaṃ dahate bhavaṃ
text.1277: aggiṇā tu ihaṃ daḍḍhā | santim icchanti māṇavā /
text.1278: koh' aggiṇā tu daḍḍhāṇaṃ | dukkhaṃ santī puṇo vi hi
text.1279: sakkā tamo -ivāretuṃ | maṇiṇā jotiṇā vi vā /
text.1281: sattaṃ buddhī matī medhā | gambhīraṃ saralattaṇaṃ /
text.1285: mahā-vise v' ahī ditte | care 'datt' ankurodaye /
text.1290: akkheviṇaṃ dav' aggī vā | kov' aggī dahate khaṇā
text.1291: koheṇa appaṃ ḍahatī paraṃ ca | atthaṃ ca dhammaṃ ca taheva kāmaṃ /
text.1292: tivvaṃ ca veraṃ pi karenti kodhā | adharaṃ gatiṃ vā vi uvinti kohā
text.1293: koh' āviddhā -a yāṇanti | mātaraṃ pitaraṃ guruṃ /
text.1294: adhikkhivanti sādhū ya | rāyāṇo devayāṇi ya
text.1296: piya-vippaoge ya bahū | jammāiṃ maraṇāṇi ya
text.1297: jeṇābhibhūto jahatī tu dhammaṃ | viddhaṃsatī jeṇa kataṃ ca puṇṇaṃ /
text.1300: haṭhaṃ ca bhāsaṃ ca samikkha paṇṇe | kovaṃ -irumbhejja sadā jit' appā
text.1301: evaṃ se siddhe buddhe ... -o puṇar-avi icc-atthaṃ havvam āgacchati tti bemi.
text.1304: [1.] savvam iṇaṃ purā udagam āsi tti sirigiriṇā māhaṇa-
text.1306: ettha aṇḍe saṃtatte, ettha loe saṃbhūte, etthaṃ sāsāse, iyaṃ
text.1310: eyaṃ savvaṃ ti bemi. [3.] -avi māyā, -a kadāti -' āsi -a kadāti
text.1314: atthamejjā khettaṃsi vā -iṇṇaṃmsi vā tatth' eva -aṃ pāduppabhāyāe
text.1315: rayaṇīye jāva tejasā jalante evaṃ khalu me kappati
text.1316: pātīṇaṃ vā paḍīṇaṃ vā dāhiṇaṃ vā udīṇaṃ vā purato juga-
text.1318: evaṃ se siddhe buddhe ... -o puṇar-avi icc-atthaṃ havvam āgacchati tti bemi.
text.1321: jaṃ suheṇa suhaṃ laddhaṃ | accanta-sukham eva taṃ /
text.1322: jaṃ sukheṇa duhaṃ laddhaṃ, | mā me teṇa samāgamo
text.1324: maṇuṇṇaṃ bhoyaṇaṃ bhoccā | maṇuṇṇaṃ saya-' āsaṇaṃ /
text.1326: amaṇuṇṇaṃ bhoyaṇaṃ bhoccā | amaṇuṇṇaṃ saya-' āsaṇaṃ /
text.1329: -' aṇṇattha lubbhaī paṇṇe, | eyaṃ buddhāṇa sāsaṇaṃ
text.1331: gehiṃ vāya-padosaṃ vā | sammaṃ vajjejja paṇḍie
text.1332: evaṃ rūvesu gandhesu rasesu phāsesu app' appaṇā' bhilāveṇaṃ.
text.1334: tass' eva tu viṇāsāya | paṇṇe vaijja saṃtayaṃ
text.1336: moha-kkhayāya em eva | duhaṃ vā jai vā suhaṃ
text.1337: -a dukkaṃ -a suhaṃ vā vi | jahā-hetu tigicchati /
text.1338: tigicchie sujuttassa | dukkhaṃ vā jai vā suhaṃ
text.1339: moha-kkhae u juttassa | dukkhaṃ vā jai vā suhaṃ /
text.1340: moha-kkhae jahā-heū | na dukkhaṃ na vi vā suhaṃ
text.1341: tucche jaṇammi saṃvego, | nivvedo uttame jaṇe /
text.1346: sattaṃ tavaṃ dayaṃ c' eva | bhāsanti jiṇa-sattamā
text.1347: dant' indiyassa vīrassa | kiṃ raṇṇe-' assameṇa vā? /
text.1348: jattha jatth' eva modejjā | taṃ raṇṇaṃ so ya assamo
text.1349: kim u dantassa raṇṇeṇaṃ | dantassa vā kim assame? /
text.1351: subhāva-bhāvit' appāṇo | suṇṇaṃ raṇṇaṃ vaṇaṃ pi vā /
text.1352: savvam etaṃ hi jhāṇāya | salla-citte va salliṇo
text.1354: kamm' ādāṇāya savvaṃ pi | kāma-citte va kāmiṇo
text.1355: sammattaṃ ca dayaṃ c' eva | -iṇṇidāṇo ya jo damo /
text.1356: tavo jogo ya savvo vi | savva-kamma-kkhayaṃkaro
text.1357: satthakaṃ vā vi ārambhaṃ | jāṇejjā ya -iratthakaṃ /
text.1358: paḍihatthiṃ sa joento | taḍaṃ ghāteti vāraṇo
text.1359: jassa kajjassa jo jogo | sāhetuṃ-je -a paccalo /
text.1360: kajjaṃ vajjeti taṃ savvaṃ | kāmī vā -agga-muṇḍaṇaṃ
text.1361: jāṇejjā saraṇaṃ dhīro, | -a koḍiṃ eti duggato /
text.1366: -a mūḍhassa tu vāhassa | mige appeti sāyakaṃ
text.1367: pacchāṇaṃ c' eva rūvaṃ ca | -icchayammi vibhāvae /
text.1368: kim atthaṃ gāyate vāho | tuṇhikkā vā vi pakkhitā?
text.1371: parivāre c' eva vese ya | bhāvitaṃ tu vibhāvae /
text.1378: pupph' ādāṇe suṇandā vā | pavakāra-gharaṃ gatā
text.1379: davve khette ya kāle ya | savva-bhāve ya savvadhā /
text.1381: evaṃ se siddhe buddhe ... -o puṇar-avi icc-atthaṃ havvam āgacchati tti bemi.
text.1384: je imaṃ pāvakaṃ kammaṃ | n' eva kujjā -a kārave /
text.1386: je -are kuvvatī pāvaṃ | andhakāraṃ mahaṃ kare /
text.1387: aṇavajjaṃ paṇḍite kiccā | ādicce va pabhāsatī
text.1388: siyā pāvaṃ saiṃ kujjā, | taṃ -a kujjā puṇo puṇo /
text.1389: -āṇi kammaṃ ca -aṃ kujjā | sādhu kammaṃ viyāṇiyā
text.1391: se nikāyaṃ ca -aṃ kujjā, | sāhu bhojjo vi jāyati
text.1392: rahasse khalu bho pāvaṃ kammaṃ samajjiṇittā davvao khettao
text.1393: kālao bhāvao kammao ajjhavasāyao sammaṃ apaliuncamāṇe
text.1394: jah' atthaṃ āloejjā. saṃjaeṇaṃ arahatā isiṇā buitaṃ.
text.1395: -avi atthi rasehiṃ bhaddaehiṃ | saṃvāseṇa ya bhaddaeṇa ya /
text.1396: jattha mie kāṇaṇosite | uvaṇāmeti vahāe sanjae
text.1397: evaṃ se siddhe buddhe ... -o puṇar-avi icc-atthaṃ havvam āgacchati tti bemi.
text.1400: iccham aṇicchaṃ purā karejjā. dīvāyaṇeṇa arahatā isiṇā
text.1402: icchā bahuvidhā loe | jāe baddho kilissati /
text.1403: tamhā iccham aṇicchāe | jiṇittā suham edhatī
text.1404: icchā' bhibhūyā -a jāṇanti | mātaraṃ pitaraṃ guruṃ /
text.1405: adhikkhivanti sādhū ya | rāyāṇo devayāṇi ya
text.1407: piya-vippaoge ya bahū | jammāiṃ maraṇāṇi ya
text.1408: icchante-' icchate icchā, | aṇicchaṃ taṃ pi icchati /
text.1409: tamhā iccham aṇicchāe | jiṇittā suham ehatī
text.1410: davvao khettao kālao bhāvao jahā-thāmaṃ jahā-balaṃ jadhā-
text.1412: evaṃ se siddhe buddhe ... -o puṇar-avi icc-atthaṃ havvam āgacchati tti bemi.
text.1416: tavaṃ te āmisaṃ kiccā | jaṇā saṃ-icate jaṇaṃ
text.1417: vikītaṃ tesi sukaḍaṃ tu | taṃ ca -issāe jīviyaṃ /
text.1418: kamma-ceṭhā ajātā vā | jāṇijjā mamakā saḍhā
text.1419: gal' ucchinnā asote vā | macchā pāvanti veyaṇaṃ /
text.1421: macchā va jhīṇa-pāṇīyā | kankāṇaṃ ghāsam āgatā /
text.1423: dittaṃ pāvanti ukkaṇṭhaṃ | vāri-majjhe va vāraṇā /
text.1425: pakkhiṇo ghata-kumbhe vā | avasā pāventi saṃkhayaṃ /
text.1426: madhu pāsyati durbuddhī, | pavātaṃ se -a passati
text.1427: āmis' atthī jhaso c' eva | maggate appaṇā galaṃ /
text.1428: āmis' atthī carittaṃ tu | jīve hiṃsati dummatī
text.1431: soa-matteṇa visaṃ gejjhaṃ | jāṇaṃ tatth' eva junjatī
text.1432: ājīv' atthaṃ tavo mottuṃ | tappate vivihaṃ bahuṃ /
text.1433: tava-nissāe jīvanto | tav' ājīvaṃ tu jīvatī
text.1435: lingaṃ ca jīva-' aṭhāe | avisuddhaṃ ti jīvatī
text.1441: māse māse ya jo bālo | kus' aggeṇa āhārae /
text.1443: mā mamaṃ jāṇaū koyī | mā 'haṃ jāṇāmi kaṃci vi /
text.1447: jahā kavotā ya kavinjalā ya | gāvo carantī iha pātaḍāo /
text.1448: evaṃ muṇī goyariyaṃ carejjā, | -o vīlave -o vi ya saṃjalejjā
text.1449: evaṃ se siddhe buddhe ... -o puṇar-avi icc-atthaṃ havvam āgacchati tti bemi.
text.1453: -iravajje ṭhitassa tu -o kappati puṇar-avi sāvajjaṃ sevittae.
text.1455: evaṃ se siddhe buddhe ... -o puṇar-avi icc-atthaṃ havvam āgacchati tti bemi.
text.1458: lābhammi je -a sumaṇo | alābhe -' eva dummaṇo /
text.1459: se hu seṭhe maṇussāṇaṃ | devāṇaṃ va sayakkaū
text.1461: evaṃ se siddhe buddhe ... -o puṇar-avi icc-atthaṃ havvam āgacchati tti bemi.
text.1464: dohiṃ angehiṃ uppīlantehiṃ ātā jassa -a uppīlati
text.1465: rāg' ange ya vidose ya se hu sammaṃ -iyacchatī.
text.1467: evaṃ se siddhe buddhe ... -o puṇar-avi icc-atthaṃ havvam āgacchati tti bemi.
text.1470: appaṃ ca āuṃ iha māṇavāṇaṃ | suciraṃ ca kālaṃ naraesu vāso /
text.1471: savve ya kāmā -irayāṇa mūlaṃ | ko -āma kāmesu buho ramejjā?
text.1472: pāvaṃ -a kujjā, -a haṇejja pāṇe | atīrase, -' eva rame kadāyī /
text.1473: uccāvaehiṃ saya-' āsaṇehiṃ | vāyu vva jālaṃ samatikkamejjā
text.1475: je pumaṃ kurute pāvaṃ | -a tass' appā dhuvaṃ pio /
text.1476: appaṇā hi kaḍaṃ kammaṃ | appaṇā c' eva bhujjatī
text.1478: maccho galaṃ gasanto vā | viṇighāyaṃ -a passati
text.1480: dittaṃ pāvati ukkaṇṭhaṃ | vāri-majjhe va vāraṇo
text.1482: sīho jaro dupāṇe vā | guṇa-dosaṃ -a vindatī
text.1483: savaso pāvaṃ purā kiccā | dukkhaṃ vedeti dummatī /
text.1485: pāvaṃ je u pakuvvanti | jīvā sotāṇugāmiṇo /
text.1486: vaḍḍhate pāvakaṃ tesiṃ | aṇaggāhissa vā aṇaṃ
text.1488: te pacchā dukkham acchanti | gal' ucchittā jadhā jhasā
text.1489: ātā-kaḍāṇa kammāṇaṃ | ātā bhunjati jaṃ phalaṃ /
text.1490: tamhā āyassa aṭhāe | pāvam ādāya vajjae
text.1491: je hutāsaṃ vivajjeti | jaṃ-visaṃ vā -a bhunjati /
text.1492: jaṃ -aṃ geṇhati vā vālaṃ | -ūṇam atthi tato 'bhayaṃ
text.1493: dhāvantaṃ sarasaṃ nīraṃ | sacchaṃ dāḍhiṃ singiṇaṃ /
text.1496: dosā dosodaī c' eva | pāva-kajjā pasūyati
text.1497: uvvi-vārā jal' oh' antā | tetaṇīe matoṭhitaṃ /
text.1498: jīvitaṃ vā vi jīvāṇaṃ, | jīvaṃ ti phala-mandiraṃ
text.1499: dejjāhi jo marantassa | sāgar' antaṃ vasuṃdharaṃ /
text.1500: jīviyaṃ vā vi jo dejjā, | jīvitaṃ tu sa icchatī
text.1501: putta-dāraṃ dhaṇaṃ rajjaṃ | vijjā sippaṃ kalā guṇā /
text.1502: jīvite sati jīvāṇaṃ | jīvitāya ratī ayaṃ
text.1503: āhār' ādī tu jīvāṇaṃ | loe jīvāṇa dijjatī /
text.1505: sattheṇa vaṇhiṇā vā vi | khate daḍḍhe va vedaṇā /
text.1506: sae dehe jahā hoti | evaṃ savvesi dehiṇaṃ
text.1507: pāṇī ya pāṇi-ghātaṃ ca | pāṇiṇaṃ ca piyā dayā /
text.1511: dev' indā dāṇav' indā ya | -ar' indā je vi vissutā /
text.1512: savva-satta-dayo' vetaṃ | mu-' īsaṃ paṇamanti te
text.1519: je 'bhiṇandanti bhāveṇa | ji-' āṇaṃ, tesi savvadhā /
text.1520: kallāṇāiṃ suhāiṃ ca | riddhīo ya -a dullahā
text.1524: kass' eyaṃ -a ppiyaṃ hojjā | icchiyaṃ va rasāyaṇaṃ?
text.1525: naṇhāto va saraṃ rammaṃ | vāhito vā ruyāharaṃ /
text.1526: chuhito va jahāhāraṃ | raṇe mūḍho va bandiyaṃ
text.1527: vaṇhiṃ sīt' āhato vā vi | -ivāyaṃ vā 'il' āhato /
text.1528: tātāraṃ vā bha' uvviggo | a-' atto vā dha-' āgamaṃ
text.1530: saraṇaṃ payato maṇṇe | ji-' inda-vayaṇaṃ tahā
text.1531: sāradaṃ va jalaṃ suddhaṃ | puṇṇaṃ vā sasi-maṇḍalaṃ /
text.1532: jacca-maṇiṃ aghaaṃ vā | thiraṃ vā metiṇī-talaṃ
text.1536: himavantaṃ giriṃ pappā | tarūṇaṃ cāru v' āgamo
text.1537: sattaṃ buddhī matī medhā | gambhīrattaṃ ca vaḍḍhatī /
text.1540: ārogga-kāraṇo c' eva | āṇā-koho duh' āvaho
text.1541: sāsaṇaṃ jaṃ -arindāo | kantāre je ya desagā /
text.1542: rog' ugghāto ya vejjāto | savvam etaṃ hie hiyaṃ
text.1546: sammaṃ kāeṇa phāsettā | puṇo -a virame tato
text.1547: baddha-cindho jadhā jodho | vamm' ārūḍho thir' āyudho /
text.1550: muncittā sa-visaṃ bhūto | piyanto jāti lāghavaṃ
text.1551: jadhā ruppi-kul' ubbhūto | ramaṇijjaṃ pi bhoyaṇaṃ /
text.1552: vantaṃ puṇo sa bhunjanto | dhid-dhi-kārassa bhāyaṇaṃ
text.1553: evaṃ ji-' indaṇāṇāe | sall' uddharaṇam eva ya /
text.1554: -iggamo ya palittāo | suhio, suham eva taṃ
text.1555: indāsaṇī -a taṃ kujjā, | ditto vaṇhī, aṇaṃ, arī /
text.1559: kosīkite vv' asī tikkho | bhāsa-cchaṇṇo va pāvao /
text.1562: taṇhā 'sātaṃ ca, sigghaṃ ca | taṇhā chindati dehiṇaṃ
text.1565: akkhovango, vaṇe levo, | tāvaṇaṃ jaṃ jaussa ya /
text.1569: hemaṃ vā āyasaṃ vā vi | bandhaṇaṃ dukkha-kāraṇaṃ /
text.1575: jātaṃ jātaṃ tu viriyaṃ | sammaṃ jujjejja saṃjame /
text.1577: evaṃ se siddhe buddhe ... -o puṇar-avi icc-atthaṃ havvam āgacchati tti bemi.
